title: Shared Citizen Wiki
synopsis: A Shared Citizen Wiki is a wiki where all members are free to write and over-write wiki pages. This is like Wikipedia except you don't have to log in. Pages can be reverted to an earlier version, but no authorship is tracked and so all entries are effectively anonymous.

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: This is an experimental space for writing together in a [[Shared Wiki]]. As long as no one claims this site, then anyone in the world can edit these pages. We call this space a [[Shared Citizen Wiki]].
